00002 // 
00003 // HITS bank compression (for use with "skimmed" data)
00004 // 
00006 
00007 #include <stdio.h>
00008 #include <assert.h>
00009 
00010 #include "midas.h"
00011 
00012 #include "mucap_compress.h"
00013 #include "mucap_structures.h"
00014 
00015 huffman_table hits_parameter_huffman;
00016 BOOL should_compress_hits = TRUE;
00017 
00018 void hits_optimize()
00019 {
00020   huffman_optimize_tree(&hits_parameter_huffman);
00021   save_huffman("/Compression/Lossless/HITS/Huffman/Parameter", &hits_parameter_huffman);
00022 }
00023 
00024 void hits_load()
00025 {
00026   huffman_init_default(&hits_parameter_huffman, 322);
00027   load_huffman("/Compression/Lossless/HITS/Huffman/Parameter", &hits_parameter_huffman);
00028 
00029   int size = sizeof(BOOL);
00030   db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Compression/Lossless/HITS/Enabled", &should_compress_hits, 
00031     &size, TID_BOOL, TRUE);
00032 }
00033 
00034 int encode_hits(channel_hit * input, int input_size, io_buffer * output, 
00035   int *uncompressed_size_p)
00036 {
00037   int prev_time = 0;
00038   int prev_parameter = 0;
00039 
00040   for (int i = 0; i < input_size; i++) {
00041     //printf("par %d time %f\n", input[i].parameter, input[i].time);
00042 
00043     int parameter = input[i].parameter;
00044     int parameter_diff = parameter - prev_parameter + 161;
00045     if(parameter_diff <= 0 || parameter_diff >= 322) {
00046       parameter_diff = 0;
00047     }
00048     huffman_put_symbol(&hits_parameter_huffman, output, parameter_diff);
00049     if(parameter_diff == 0) {
00050       io_buffer_put(output, parameter, 13);      
00051     }
00052 
00053     int time = (int) ((input[i].time+0.01)/1.25);
00054     int time_diff = time - prev_time;
00055     assert (time_diff >= 0);
00056 
00057     if (time_diff < 64) {
00058         io_buffer_put(output, 0, 1);
00059         io_buffer_put(output, time_diff & 0x3f, 6);
00060     } else if (time_diff < 4096) {
00061         io_buffer_put(output, 2, 2);
00062         io_buffer_put(output, time_diff & 0xfff, 12);
00063     } else {
00064         io_buffer_put(output, 3, 2);
00065         io_buffer_put(output, time_diff, 29);
00066     }
00067 
00068     prev_time = time;
00069     prev_parameter = parameter;
00070   }
00071 
00072   *uncompressed_size_p = input_size;
00073 
00074   return flush_output_buffer(output);
00075 }
00076 
00077 int hits_compress(channel_hit * input, int input_size, unsigned char *output, int userParam)
00078 {
00079   input_size /= sizeof(channel_hit);
00080 
00081   rle_bits_setup();
00082 
00083   io_buffer output_buffer;
00084 
00085   // reserve space for size of uncompressed data (may be different from
00086   // input size, since some hits may be stripped)
00087   int *uncompressed_size_p = (int *) output;
00088   output += sizeof(int);
00089 
00090   // reserve space for the size of the compressed data
00091   int *compressed_time_size_p = (int *) output;
00092   output += sizeof(int);
00093 
00094   // compress times
00095   start_output_buffer(&output_buffer, output);
00096   int compressed_time_size =
00097       encode_hits(input, input_size, &output_buffer, uncompressed_size_p);
00098   output += compressed_time_size;
00099 
00100   // store size of compressed times
00101   *compressed_time_size_p = compressed_time_size;
00102 
00103   return compressed_time_size + 2 * sizeof(int);
00104 }
00105 
00106 void decode_hits(io_buffer * input, channel_hit * output)
00107 {
00108   int prev_time = 0;
00109   int prev_parameter = 0;
00110 
00111   int i = 0;
00112   while (1) {
00113 
00114     int parameter = 0;
00115     int parameter_diff = huffman_get_symbol(&hits_parameter_huffman, input);
00116     if (parameter_diff < 0) {
00117       break;
00118     } else if(parameter_diff == 0) {
00119       parameter = io_buffer_get(input, 13);
00120     } else {
00121       parameter = prev_parameter + parameter_diff - 161;
00122     }
00123     output[i].parameter = parameter;
00124 
00125     int time_length_flag1 = io_buffer_get(input, 1);
00126     int time_diff;
00127     if (time_length_flag1 == 0) {
00128         time_diff = io_buffer_get(input, 6);
00129     } else {
00130         int time_length_flag2 = io_buffer_get(input, 1);
00131         if (time_length_flag2 == 0) {
00132           time_diff = io_buffer_get(input, 12);
00133         } else {
00134           time_diff = io_buffer_get(input, 29);
00135         }
00136     }
00137 
00138     output[i].time = (prev_time + time_diff) * 1.25;
00139     prev_time = prev_time + time_diff;
00140     prev_parameter = parameter;
00141 
00142     //printf("par %d time %f\n", output[i].parameter, output[i].time);
00143 
00144     i++;
00145   }
00146 }
00147 
00148 int hits_expand(unsigned char *input, int input_size, channel_hit * output, int userParam)
00149 {
00150   // 
00151   // Uncompress the data produced by hits_compress().
00152   // 
00153 
00154   rle_bits_setup();
00155 
00156   // Get uncompressed data size
00157   int *uncompressed_size_p = (int *) input;
00158   int uncompressed_size = *uncompressed_size_p;
00159   input += sizeof(int);
00160   input_size -= sizeof(int);
00161 
00162   // Get size of compressed time data
00163   int *compressed_time_size_p = (int *) input;
00164   int compressed_time_size = *compressed_time_size_p;
00165   input += sizeof(int);
00166   input_size -= sizeof(int);
00167 
00168   // Uncompress times
00169   io_buffer input_buffer;
00170   start_input_buffer(&input_buffer, input);
00171   decode_hits(&input_buffer, output);
00172   input += compressed_time_size;
00173   input_size -= compressed_time_size;
00174 
00175   return uncompressed_size * sizeof(channel_hit);
00176 }
